scripts.build-cjs: rm -rfv build/cjs && npx tsc --outDir build/cjs --module CommonJS
scripts.bundle-ng-inject: npm run build && npx esbuild src/injection/inject_into_neuroglancer.ts --bundle --loader:.ts=ts --sourcemap --outfile=build/inject_into_neuroglancer.js
scripts.bundle-img-inject: npm run build && npx esbuild src/injection/inject_into_img.ts --bundle --loader:.ts=ts --sourcemap --outfile=build/inject_into_img.js
